markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Ran-to](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1476)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 42

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 40

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 37
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 14">[Ran-to](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1476)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Goblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=81" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island](/Sources.aspx?ID=85) pg. 64</row>

**Perception** +20; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Goblin](/Languages.aspx?ID=6), [Tien](/Languages.aspx?ID=43), [Ysoki](/Languages.aspx?ID=61)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +24, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +30, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +24, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +23, [Wrestling Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +19

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +4

**Con** +6

**Int** -1

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
_+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) gauntlet_, _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [halfling sling staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=78)_ (20 bullets), _+1 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [studded leather armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=5)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 35 

**Fort** +28 

**Ref** +24 

**Will** +21 

</row>

**HP** 330

**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** <actions string="Reaction" /> When a creature triggers Ran-to's Attack of Opportunity, he can attempt an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check to [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=35) the triggering creature instead of making a melee Strike. He can still disrupt a triggering [manipulate](/Actions.aspx?ID=639) action if he critically succeeds his attempt.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_gauntlet_ +30 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Free-Hand](/Traits.aspx?ID=181), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 3d4+14 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_halfling sling staff_ +28 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 80 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 3d10+10 bludgeoning

**Body Slam** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** Ran-to has a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20); **Effect** Ran-to throws his foe against the ground. The grabbed creature takes 8d6 bludgeoning damage and is knocked [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31). The grapple ends.

**Leaping Catch** <actions string="Two Actions" />  Ran-to makes a mighty leap and attempts to Grab a foe while he soars. He makes a [Leap](/Actions.aspx?ID=81), [High Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=36), or [Long Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=37). His maximum distance is 40 feet. He must succeed at an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check to perform the leap as usual, but regardless of the type of leap, the DC is equal to the number of feet he moves in the air. Ran-to can attempt an Athletics check to [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=35) at any point during the jump. Immediately after the attempt, he (and the creature, if the Grapple was successful) falls to the ground. Neither creature takes damage from this fall.

**Titan Wrestler**   Ran-to can attempt to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41), [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=35), [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38), or [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40) creatures up to two sizes larger than him.

**Whirlwind Toss** <actions string="Three Actions" />  **Frequency** once per round; **Requirements** Ran-to has a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20); **Effect** Ran-to spins the creature he's holding, smashing them against any creatures within his reach, and then throws the creature aside. Ran-to attempts an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check against the grabbed creature's Fortitude DC. **Critical Success** Ran-to tosses his foe a great distance. The grapple ends. The grabbed creature is thrown into a space within 10 feet, takes 10d6 bludgeoning damage, and falls [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31). All creatures adjacent to Ran-to take the same amount of bludgeoning damage (DC 34 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). **Success** As critical success, except the grabbed creatures is thrown into a space within 5 feet, and creatures take 6d6 bludgeoning damage. **Failure** Ran-to tosses his foe aside. The grapple ends. The grabbed creature falls [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31). **Critical Failure** Ran-to loses hold of his foe and the grapple ends.

</column>
name: Ran-to

<additional-info>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 330

**AC** 35

**Fort** +28

**Ref** +24

**Will** +21

**Perception** +20
</row>
</additional-info>
